ids module

Vision Based Navigation Project Augusta University 3/11/2022

This file contains the ID class. The ID class is responsible for differenting between separate drones and keeping track of thier positions. The idea is to eliminate ID swapping.

ISSUES:

Drone Flying off screen causes the ID’s to fight over the position of one drone.

Linking an IP address with an ID is sketchy. The Tensorflow Model must detect the drones in the right order for the IP and ID to match.

ids.py

class ids.ID(position: point.Point, color: tuple = (255, 0, 0))[source]

Bases: object

ID class. Keeps track of separate ID’s and their respective positions.

classmethod createID(point: point.Point, color: tuple)[source]

Creates an ID and puts it in the instances list

Parameters

point (point.Point) – The position of this ID.

Optional param color

A tuple of the desired color.

classmethod update_positions(possible_positions: list[point.Point])[source]

Given possible_positions, this function determines which ID is closest to the possible_positions and reassigns this new position as the drones position.

Parameters

possible_positions (List of point.Point) – A list containing pairs of (x,y) coordinates using the point.Point class.

classmethod set_target_flag(possible_flags)[source]

Sets the target_flag attribute of velocityTracking attribute for each instance of an ID.

Parameters

possible_flags (List of point.Point) – A list containing pairs of (x,y) coordinates using the point.Point class.

classmethod set_vec_start()[source]

Sets the vec_start attribute of velocityTracking attribute for each instance of an ID.

classmethod set_vec_end()[source]

Sets the vec_end attribute of velocityTracking attribute for each instance of an ID.

classmethod update_vecs()[source]

Calls the update_vector method of velocityTracking attribute for each instance of an ID.

classmethod assign_destination(destinations)[source]

Not implemented method to take a list of flags/destinations and split them between each ID.

classmethod draw_histories(img)[source]

Draws Points that each ID was previously registered at. The history is limited by the size of the position_history deque attribute of each ID.

Parameters

img (Numpy Array) – The image the position history is supposed to be drawn on

classmethod draw_vectors(img)[source]

Draws the direction vectors, and the path to get to the flag for each instance of an ID.

Parameters

img (Numpy Array) – The image the vectors are supposed to be drawn on

classmethod draw_id_nums(img)[source]

Draws the ID# near each ID for each instance of an ID.

__post_init__()[source]

Finishes setting up an individual instance of an ID.

Attribute position_history

This position history of the ID. Updated everytim the position is updated.

Attribute velocityTracking

An extension class to handle using the ID’s infomration to calculate relevant velocity information.

appendPosition(position: point.Point)[source]

A method to add a position to the position_history deque.

Parameters

position (point.Point) – A (x,y) coordinate using the point.Point class.

Get’s a subsection of the position_history No longer used after implementing the deque for position_history

Parameters

num_points (Int) – The number of points desired.
